text: Radha Prakash Yadav is a cricketer from India. Radha plays for Mumbai women's cricket team, Baroda women's cricket team and West Zone women's cricket team. She was born on April 21, 2000.Radha Yadav Radha became the first female cricketer from Gujarat domestic squad to be picked for Indian womens cricket team when she was selected to play against South Africa at a young age of 17. == References == == Other websites == *Radha Yadav from ESPNcricinfo Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Indian cricketers Category:Sportspeople from Mumbai
title: Radha Yadav
